name: Pikachu
philosophical_phrase: The greatest obstacle in life is the lack of self-belief.

name: Charmander
philosophical_phrase: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.

name: Squirtle
philosophical_phrase: The key to success is to never give up, even when things get tough.

name: Bulbasaur
philosophical_phrase: Change is the only constant in life.

name: Jigglypuff
philosophical_phrase: Beauty is not just in the eye of the beholder, but in the heart as well.

name: Snorlax
philosophical_phrase: Rest is not idleness, and to lie sometimes on the grass under trees on a summer's day, listening to the murmur of the water, or watching the clouds float across the sky, is by no means a waste of time.

name: Mewtwo
philosophical_phrase: True strength lies not in physical power, but in mental fortitude.

name: Eevee
philosophical_phrase: The path to true happiness is not always clear, but it is always worth pursuing.
